channel.title: Hyperion Server Help [HELP] Please
channel.description:
hey guy i have this problem whenever i run project annihlations hyperion server using eclipse too i followed a youtube video how to set server using eclipse which was for PJA Hyperion
even normally without using eclipse same thing.. any help pleasee! Plzz :( [code]Jul 13, 2010 8:35:33 PM org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... Jul 13, 2010 8:35:33 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Jul 13, 2010 8:35:33 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... Jul 13, 2010 8:35:33 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... Jul 13, 2010 8:35:33 PM org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready Jul 13, 2010 8:35:33 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... Jul 13, 2010 8:35:34 PM org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... Jul 13, 2010 8:35:34 PM org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... Jul 13, 2010 8:35:36 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. Jul 13, 2010 8:35:36 PM org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheExceptio n: No index files present. at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(Blockin gExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheException: No index files present. at org.hyperion.cache.Cache.<init>(Cache.java:75) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager.load(ObjectManager.java:44) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$2.call(World.java:125) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source ) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Jul 13, 2010 8:35:36 PM org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Hyperion Server Help [HELP] Please
item.dc:creator: @ownage_milk ownage milk
item.description:
@ownage_milk wrote:

nonono :\ wheres cache at? what folder in the server file or client file :\
im new but ill do whatever it takes to learn hyperion sorry for like this… everyone starts new right…

Help anyone please?

Read full topic

item.title: Hyperion Server Help [HELP] Please
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

Did you put the cache in your C:/ directory?

Read full topic
